dashboard.label: Catchpoint Commit History
dashboard.description: Overview of the Splunk App for Catchpoint's Dev Cycle

search.query: sourcetype=github_commits| stats count | rename count AS "Total Commits"
sourcetype=github_commits| stats count by author | rename count AS "Number of Commits" author AS "Author of Commit"

sourcetype=github_commits| eval formatted_time=strftime(_time, "%b %d, %Y %H:%M")| table formatted_time, author, message, url| rename author AS "Author" message AS "Message" url AS "URL" formatted_time AS "Date"
